events.message: We have successfully received the candidate’s application for the Software Engineer position.
The application was reviewed and categorized under Engineering due to the role title and skills listed.
A recruiter specialized in technical hiring was assigned to manage the candidate’s application.
The initial phone screen was conducted and the candidate demonstrated strong communication and technical knowledge.
The candidate responded promptly and expressed enthusiasm to proceed with the technical interview.
We successfully scheduled the technical interview for next week, coordinating availability with both candidate and engineering panel.
